AboutCard.title: Who I Am
AboutCard.text: I'm Mauro Cunsolo, a passionate backend developer with a love for web, open source, and digital creativity. I enjoy experimenting with new technologies, animations, and games. In my free time, I contribute to open source projects and develop interactive prototypes.
AboutCard.curiosity: Curious, creative, and always eager to learn something new.
AboutCard.belief: I believe in sharing knowledge and collaboration.

AvailabilityCard.title: Availability
AvailabilityCard.subtitle: Let's Work Together
AvailabilityCard.text: I'm open to new job opportunities and collaborations. If you're interested in working with me or just want to discuss a project, don't hesitate to reach out!

HomePage.subtitle: A passionate Backend Developer & Open Source Enthusiast
